messages.content:
The user asked you to create the source code with the following specification:
```
<REQUEST>
<goal>show the data from `simpleValue2`</goal>

<description>Show the data from the `simpleValue2` charm, displaying its current value and any associated metadata.</description>
</REQUEST>
<PLAN>1. Fetch the simpleValue2 data from the existing schema
2. Parse and format the values array for display
3. Render the values in a simple list interface with index numbers</PLAN>
<SPEC>The SimpleValue2 Viewer will display all string values stored in the simpleValue2.values array. It will show each value as a list item with its index position. The viewer will handle empty arrays gracefully by displaying a "No values found" message.</SPEC>
```
